entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning. Snow mixed with ice pellets late this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of snow. Snow mixed with ice pellets late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
